channel.title: Pi on KN100 | Kevin Norman
channel.description: Recent content in Pi on KN100 | Kevin Norman

item.title: Spooky Ghost on a Pi, Because Why Not?
item.description: This is a description of how this blog is currently hosted. Hopefully, I’d like to do more interesting stuff with the Pi and post about it here. Hardware The system currently hosting this blog is a Raspberry Pi 3b+. This is the (at the current time) latest revision of the single board computer, and features a slightly higher clock rate over the 3b, as well as better network performance. This is attached to a pretty standard 2 amp capable wall wart.
